Your "official" rank probably isn't DMG either due to the change to the elo system, which made almost everyone derank. You're good around mg2/mge if you were a DMG.

ex-IBP unbanned is mainly what I want. That is kind of our last hope for NA CS, it's so sad to see 4 of the best players banned. With them, NA could actually compete against European teams. I mean, sure C9 and Liquid may have been able to compete against them as well, but with ex-IBP NA would have a way higher chance.
However, for now we should just expect them to not be unbanned. If it does happen, hell, that'd be fucking amazing.
FACEIT unranked is probably around MG to DMG level. With a subscription however you can play ranked faceit which is more fair than the MM ranking system.

No, no you don't. If the bottom fragger has the same amount of wins in a row, but more MVPs in those games he ranks up faster. Elo system doesn't give a fuck about frags or score. Only counts wins, losses, ties and MVPs.

WRITING.TEXT: Have a merry christmas, we still want better prize pools.
out of 17 games, I've lost 14 games, won 3, no derank from dmg. How the hell am I not affected by this shit lol.

"I have to apologise... "

At the time, most teams did not have salaries. Match-fixing was a thing multiple teams did, thing is, most weren't "stupid" enough to get caught doing so.
What's also annoying, there was not a rule and punishment at the time for match-fixing. They should in my opinion set IBP as an example, give them a 1 year ban (which would almost be over) and after that if any other team does it give them a permanent ban.
Not entirely sure about this, but the old Epsilon match-fixed as well and only got a 1 year ban? If that is true it's even more bullshit that IBP get's permanent banned. However, like I said, not entirely sure if their ban was just a year.
Don't you think they should get a second chance though? Do you think that if any IBP got unbanned, that they will ever do it again? I don't think so.

Yeah that's what I used to be in lower ranks, always top fragging because I was "lurking", but I was really just baiting my team. Nowadays I play a mix between entry fragger and lurker. Thing is, I also started to realise that rank really doesn't matter. It's just a game I always keep in mind. Ranking up would be a nice side effect, but for me it's mainly about having fun.

I personally don't "suffer" from this effect, however I know some people who do. I am going to share this video with them. It's very informative video, thanks for making it.
Also, that smoke edit was dope.
